page.title: 19A MARKET SURVEY IN HEDON
page.content: {A Visit to the Market Place.} At school we were interested in finding out whether the people of Hedon wanted an open{market}.We made a questionnaire and interviewed some of the shoppers in Hedon. The majority of people we spoke to were in favour of having a market.They felt that it would improve the shopping facilities of the town.They thought it would help to lower the prices,provide a greater variety of goods on offer. Some people were against a market because they thought it would cause {traffic }problems,would increase the amount of{litter},too many strangers would visit the town and spoil the friendly atmosphere.Some of the shopkeepers felt that it would damage their business.
